input.sentences: peddling off down the street for exercise .
biking to the market for some shopping .

output.sentences: I was in the street peddling to get some exercise.
I figured while I was biking I might as well go shopping at the market.
There was a woman there who was wrapped and filled with warmth.
I went for another ride to meet with friends.
It can get worrisome riding my bike in the city.
